UI_visible_response: To access YouTube, you can follow these steps: Open a web browser and type youtube.com in the address bar, then press Enter1. If you're using a mobile device, you can also download the YouTube app from the Google Play or Apple App Store, install it, and open the app to access YouTube4. For users who prefer accessing the desktop version of YouTube on their phone, they can do so by accessing the menu in their browser and selecting the option to request the desktop site3. Additionally, if you want to view the full YouTube site from a tablet or mobile phone, you can open YouTube in your mobile browser, tap the three-vertical-dots in the top-right corner, and choose the appropriate option to view the full site6.
traffic_visible_response: To access YouTube, you can follow these steps: Open a web browser and type youtube.com in the address bar, then press Enter [[1]]. If you're using a mobile device, you can also download the YouTube app from the Google Play or Apple App Store, install it, and open the app to access YouTube [[4]]. For users who prefer accessing the desktop version of YouTube on their phone, they can do so by accessing the menu in their browser and selecting the option to request the desktop site [[3]]. Additionally, if you want to view the full YouTube site from a tablet or mobile phone, you can open YouTube in your mobile browser, tap the three-vertical-dots in the top-right corner, and choose the appropriate option to view the full site [[6]].
